UNTDID6345Type.title: Currency identification code
UNTDID6345Type.description:
Code specifying a monetary unit.

Applicable codes:
* 'AED' - Dirham
* 'AFN' - Afghani
* 'ALL' - Lek
* 'AMD' - Dram
* 'ANG' - Netherlands Antillian Guilder
* 'AOA' - Kwanza
* 'ARS' - Argentine Peso
